Player History
Drafted in 19th round, 217th overall pick, by Baltimore in 2019...
Earned first career win on 4/4/2019...
Injured on 5/25/2019 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 7/10/2019, off James Culberson (NYY)...
Won Gold Glove at Pitcher in 2019...
Signed as a free agent by Washington on 2/1/2021 to a 3-year deal worth $9,000,000 per year...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/2021, going 5-1, 1.10...
